entry.title: Hello World
entry.content: ğŸ˜œä¸çŸ¥é“ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆï¼Œçªç„¶ç©èµ·äº†åšå®¢ğŸ˜œã€‚ æ—¢ç„¶å¦‚æ­¤ï¼Œå°±æ¥å°è¯•æ–°çš„ã€ä¸ä¸€æ ·çš„äº‹ç‰©å§ï¼ ğŸ†—ï¼Œæ‹©å¿ƒï¼ŒCome Onã€‚ ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯â€¦.. ç³»ç»Ÿå†…å®¹Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment Hexoå®˜ç½‘ ğŸ‘ˆğŸ‘ˆğŸ‘ˆ
